sentences.en: " Neglecting the commandment of God, you hold to the tradition of men. "
sentences.cn: 可 7:8 你们是离弃神的诫命 、 拘守人的遗传.

sentences.en: A friend of mine applied this commandment in his own life, with great success.
sentences.cn: 我的一位朋友在自己的生活中应用了这个戒律，而且大获成功。

sentences.en: And now this commandment is for you, O priests.
sentences.cn: 1众祭司阿,现今这诫命是给你们的.

sentences.en: And now, O ye priests, this commandment is for you.
sentences.cn: 1众祭司阿, 这诫命是传给你们的.

sentences.en: And this is why God has given us the first commandment.
sentences.cn: 上帝也是为此赐给了我们十诫.

sentences.en: Bill Gates ran the word commandment through a database search.
sentences.cn: 比尔?盖茨从数据库中检索“诫命”一词.

sentences.en: But I speak this by permission, and not of commandment.
sentences.cn: 6我说这话,原是准你们的, 不是命你们的.

sentences.en: But they rested on the Sabbath in obedience to the commandment.
sentences.cn: 她们在安息日,便遵着诫命安息了.

sentences.en: He sendeth forth his commandment upon earth : his word runneth very swiftly.
sentences.cn: 他发命在地.他的话颁行最快.

sentences.en: Honesty is also a commandment God gave to us.
sentences.cn: 诚实也是神给我们的诫命.

sentences.en: Is there any need to enforce that commandment by violence?
sentences.cn: 难道实行这条诫命还需要使用暴力 吗 ?

sentences.en: Master, which is the great commandment in the law?
sentences.cn: 夫子 、 律法上的诫命、那一条是最大的 呢 .

sentences.en: October 27 The word of God was not a commandment, but a covenant.
sentences.cn: 上帝的话语不是戒律, 而是契约.

sentences.en: So you would not break the third commandment.
sentences.cn: 那么你就不会违反第三条戒律。

sentences.en: Teacher, which is the greatest commandment in the Law?
sentences.cn: 老师, 律法中哪一条诫命是最重要的 呢 ?

sentences.en: The eighth commandment is "Thou shalt not steal".
While leaving the commandment of God, you hold the tradition of men.
sentences.cn: 8你们是离弃神的诫命, 拘守人的传统.
